
{{alias}}( m, b )
    Computes the Jacobi elliptic functions sn, cn, and dn.

    Parameters
    ----------
    m: number
        Input value.

    b: boolean
        Input scale.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array
        Jacobi elliptic functions.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 0.5, 0 )
    [ ~0.479, ~0.878, 1 ]
    > v = {{alias}}( 0.5, -1.0 )
    [ ~0.497, ~0.868, ~1.117 ]
    > v = {{alias}}( Infinity, 0.5 )
    [ NaN, NaN, NaN ]
    > v = {{alias}}( -Infinity )
    [ NaN, NaN, NaN ]
    > v = {{alias}}( NaN )
    [ NaN, NaN, NaN ]

    See Also
    --------
